item.title: CFP semifinal takeaways: Utter dominance has become the norm for Indiana
item.description: The Hoosiers (somehow) keep getting better. How can Miami slow them down?

item.title: Stafford, Garrett, Nacua top NFL All-Pro Team
item.description: Matthew Stafford, Myles Garrett, Puka Nacua and Jaxon Smith-Njigba headline the 2025 Associated Press NFL All-Pro Team.

item.title: 'Really poor finish': Early turnovers stymie Ducks
item.description: Oregon sustained a second straight ugly exit from the College Football Playoff, giving up three first-half turnovers in a 56-22 loss to Indiana.

item.title: Macclesfield beats champ Palace in FA Cup shock
